articles.title: Latest Ukraine-Russia War News: Live Updates - The New York Times
articles.description: The move by state-run Gazprom was Russia’s toughest retaliation yet against European sanctions and aid for Ukraine. As the U.S. and allies pledge to continue sending arms, a series of blasts inside Russia raised fears that the conflict could spread.

articles.description: The Kremlin’s move to cut off natural gas shipments to Bulgaria and Poland was a blow to Europe, which relies on Russia for much of its energy.

articles.title: SpaceX launches 'Crew 4' astronauts on flight to space station - Rappler
articles.description: If all goes to plan, the three US astronauts and a European Space Agency crewmate from Italy will reach the space station after a 17-hour flight to begin a six-month science mission orbiting some 420 km above Earth
